definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: All in all, I liked THREE-BODY PROBLEM, but I can't say I loved it.
sentences.chinese: 總之，我喜歡三體問題，但我不能說熱愛它。

sentences.english: The old three-body problem is solved by doing enough arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 古老的三體問題在進行充分的演算後，加以解決了。
